message_1: Suppose you are given the ciphertext "KZZF" encrypted using a simple substitution cipher where each letter of the alphabet is shifted three places down the line, such that A is transformed into D, B into E, C into F, and so on. Use Cryptanalysis to determine the plaintext message.
message_2:
To decrypt the ciphertext "KZZF" using the simple substitution cipher with a shift of three places back, we will reverse the process by shifting each letter three places up the line.

K -> (shift 3 back) -> H
Z -> (shift 3 back) -> W
Z -> (shift 3 back) -> W
F -> (shift 3 back) -> C

So, the plaintext message is "HWWC".
